00022 void b3GpuGenericConstraint::getInfo1 (unsigned int* info,const b3RigidBodyData* bodies)
00023 {
00024         switch (m_constraintType)
00025         {
00026         case B3_GPU_POINT2POINT_CONSTRAINT_TYPE:
00027                 {
00028                         *info = 3;
00029                         break;
00030                 };
00031                 default:
00032                 {
00033                         b3Assert(0);
00034                 }
00035         };
00036 }
00037 
00038 void getInfo2Point2Point(b3GpuGenericConstraint* constraint, b3GpuConstraintInfo2* info,  const b3RigidBodyData* bodies)
00039 {
00040         b3Transform trA;
00041         trA.setIdentity();
00042         trA.setOrigin(bodies[constraint->m_rbA].m_pos);
00043         trA.setRotation(bodies[constraint->m_rbA].m_quat);
00044 
00045         b3Transform trB;
00046         trB.setIdentity();
00047         trB.setOrigin(bodies[constraint->m_rbB].m_pos);
00048         trB.setRotation(bodies[constraint->m_rbB].m_quat);
00049 
00050                 // anchor points in global coordinates with respect to body PORs.
00051    
00052     // set jacobian
00053     info->m_J1linearAxis[0] = 1;
00054         info->m_J1linearAxis[info->rowskip+1] = 1;
00055         info->m_J1linearAxis[2*info->rowskip+2] = 1;
00056 
00057         b3Vector3 a1 = trA.getBasis()*constraint->getPivotInA();
00058         //b3Vector3 a1a = b3QuatRotate(trA.getRotation(),constraint->getPivotInA());
00059 
00060         {
00061                 b3Vector3* angular0 = (b3Vector3*)(info->m_J1angularAxis);
00062                 b3Vector3* angular1 = (b3Vector3*)(info->m_J1angularAxis+info->rowskip);
00063                 b3Vector3* angular2 = (b3Vector3*)(info->m_J1angularAxis+2*info->rowskip);
00064                 b3Vector3 a1neg = -a1;
00065                 a1neg.getSkewSymmetricMatrix(angular0,angular1,angular2);
00066         }
00067     
00068         if (info->m_J2linearAxis)
00069         {
00070                 info->m_J2linearAxis[0] = -1;
00071                 info->m_J2linearAxis[info->rowskip+1] = -1;
00072                 info->m_J2linearAxis[2*info->rowskip+2] = -1;
00073         }
00074         
00075         b3Vector3 a2 = trB.getBasis()*constraint->getPivotInB();
00076    
00077         {
00078         //      b3Vector3 a2n = -a2;
00079                 b3Vector3* angular0 = (b3Vector3*)(info->m_J2angularAxis);
00080                 b3Vector3* angular1 = (b3Vector3*)(info->m_J2angularAxis+info->rowskip);
00081                 b3Vector3* angular2 = (b3Vector3*)(info->m_J2angularAxis+2*info->rowskip);
00082                 a2.getSkewSymmetricMatrix(angular0,angular1,angular2);
00083         }
00084     
00085 
00086 
00087     // set right hand side
00088 //      b3Scalar currERP = (m_flags & B3_P2P_FLAGS_ERP) ? m_erp : info->erp;
00089         b3Scalar currERP = info->erp;
00090 
00091         b3Scalar k = info->fps * currERP;
00092     int j;
00093         for (j=0; j<3; j++)
00094     {
00095         info->m_constraintError[j*info->rowskip] = k * (a2[j] + trB.getOrigin()[j] - a1[j] - trA.getOrigin()[j]);
00096                 //printf("info->m_constraintError[%d]=%f\n",j,info->m_constraintError[j]);
00097     }
00098 #if 0
00099         if(m_flags & B3_P2P_FLAGS_CFM)
00100         {
00101                 for (j=0; j<3; j++)
00102                 {
00103                         info->cfm[j*info->rowskip] = m_cfm;
00104                 }
00105         }
00106 #endif
00107 
00108 #if 0
00109         b3Scalar impulseClamp = m_setting.m_impulseClamp;//
00110         for (j=0; j<3; j++)
00111     {
00112                 if (m_setting.m_impulseClamp > 0)
00113                 {
00114                         info->m_lowerLimit[j*info->rowskip] = -impulseClamp;
00115                         info->m_upperLimit[j*info->rowskip] = impulseClamp;
00116                 }
00117         }
00118         info->m_damping = m_setting.m_damping;
00119 #endif
00120 
00121 }
00122 
00123 void b3GpuGenericConstraint::getInfo2 (b3GpuConstraintInfo2* info,  const b3RigidBodyData* bodies)
00124 {
00125         switch (m_constraintType)
00126         {
00127         case B3_GPU_POINT2POINT_CONSTRAINT_TYPE:
00128                 {
00129                         getInfo2Point2Point(this,info,bodies);
00130                         break;
00131                 };
00132                 default:
00133                         {
00134                                 b3Assert(0);
00135                         }
00136         };
00137 }
